trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

trans-unit.source: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay CARDNAME's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay CARDNAME's mana cost.

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

trans-unit.source: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.
trans-unit.target: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, pay {1} for each target beyond the first.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, pay {1} for each target beyond the first.

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.

trans-unit.source: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.
trans-unit.target: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.

trans-unit.source: Hellbent If you have no cards in hand, CARDNAME can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.
trans-unit.target: Hellbent If you have no cards in hand, CARDNAME can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.
